ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🛥️ Boats sail on me.
🐳 Big animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I'm very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat algae and seagrass.
🐌 I'm like a land snail, but I live in the sea.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean. I have a blowhole.

hints.text: 🎶 Some of us sing songs.
🌊 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🐳 I am bigger than an elephant.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I can change colors to hide.
🐙 I don't have any bones.
🖐️ I have eight arms, not hands.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body and both of my eyes on the same side of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can camouflage against the ocean floor.
〰️ I swim a bit sideways.
🍳 I am shaped like a pancake.

ocean.question: I am a tall plant that lives in the sea. Many fish like to hide in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I sway back and forth with the water.
🐟 You can find many sea creatures living near me.
🌲 I'm like a tree, but under the sea.

ocean.question: I am a type of shell that is often pink or white. If you hold me to your ear, you can hear the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 Some people collect me.
👸 Ariel wore one in the movie The Little Mermaid.
👂 Some say you can hear the sea when you put it to your ear.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny animals that build colorful homes in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I can be many different colors.
🐠 Fish love to live near me.
🏡 I am a home for many creatures but I am an animal myself.

ocean.question: I am a place where the ocean meets the land. You can find shells and build sandcastles here. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ People like to relax on me.
🦀 Crabs crawl all over me.
🌊 The ocean washes up on me.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature known for my venomous barb on my tail that I use for defense. What am I?

hints.text: 🪢 I am related to sharks.
🌊 I like warm oceans.
🪡 My barb is like a needle.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I can be red or black, but I'm very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I often work in colonies.
🧺 You might see me at a picnic.
🚶 I am not a spider.

bug.question: I float on the breeze, with colorful wings. I used to be a caterpillar, now that's a funny thing! What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to visit flowers.
🦋 I start as an egg.
🌈 I have pretty wings.

bug.question: I buzz and make honey, and live in a hive. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I collect nectar from flowers.
🐝 I can sting if I'm scared.
💛 I am often yellow and black.

bug.question: I hop and jump, I'm green you see, and I make music for you and me! What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I can make a chirping sound.
🌿 I like to eat grass.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.

bug.question: I am a round bug, red with black spots. Finding me brings good luck, or so it's thought! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I eat aphids in gardens.
⚫ I have dots on my back.
🔴 I am usually red.

bug.question: I light up the night, a tiny bright spark. I'm a beetle that glows, even when it's dark! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am also called a lightning bug.
💡 I produce light through bioluminescence.
🌙 I am active at night.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web, and wait for my prey. Eight legs I possess, what am I, say?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🪰 I eat flies and other small bugs.

bug.question: I have large eyes and shimmering wings, and I dart through the air, what am I brings? I live near water.

hints.text: 💧 I lay my eggs near water.
💨 I am fast and agile.
👁️ I have excellent vision.

bug.question: I munch on leaves and like to hide, some people think that I am gross. I blend in with sticks or leaves.

hints.text: 🌿 I am a master of disguise.
🌳 I can look just like a branch.
🍃 I am long and green.

bug.question: I'm known for camouflage, a master of disguise, I stay very still to trick your eyes. I am a predator with powerful arms.

hints.text: 🙏 My front legs are for grabbing prey.
🌿 I blend in with plants to ambush my food.
🦗 I eat other bugs.
